name: Offshift
public_notice: Offshift (XFT) has migrated from their older contract to a new one. For more information, please view this blog announcement.

description.en: Pioneering #PriFi with the world’s first Private Derivatives Platform. 1:1 Collateralization, Zero slippage, Zero liquidations - we promise. #zkAssets are here.
